Package controller

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Game
  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for controlling a Spectrangle game.
    Version:
    2019.01.30
    Author:
    Corjan van den Brink

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Game​(java.util.List<Player> players)
      Constructor for game receives players list in a randomized order and sets up the the game for these players.

      check if game is finished.
      static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      running this creates a human and a computerplayer to play against each other for testing purposes.

      Increment consecutive passes counter, other moves reset this counter.

      Give the turn to the next player while the game is active and handle end of game.

      Deals 4 tiles to each player.

      updates the UI for the game status.

      • Game

        public Game​(java.util.List<Player> players)

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        running this creates a human and a computerplayer to play against each other for testing purposes.
        Parameters:
        args - not necessary

      • setUpGame

        public void setUpGame()
        Deals 4 tiles to each player.

      • play

        public void play()
        Give the turn to the next player while the game is active and handle end of game.

      • update

        public void update()
        updates the UI for the game status.

      • isFinished

        public boolean isFinished()
        check if game is finished.
        Returns:
        true if no one can make a turn or board is full

      • allPlayersPassed

        public boolean allPlayersPassed()
        if the amount of consecutive passes is all players, all have passed.
        Returns:
        true if all players passed

      • nextPlayer

        public int nextPlayer()
        Calculates the index of the next player and returns it.
        Returns:
        index for the next player

      • doMove

        public void doMove​(Move move)
        Should update the board with a valid move. This can be an update to the fields, a discard of a tile or a pass.
        Parameters:
        move - the game board

      • placeTile

        public void placeTile​(int index,
                      RotatableTile tile)
        Makes the move by placing the tile and adding points.
        Parameters:
        index - index of field
        tile - tile to be placed in right orientation

      • discard

        public void discard​(RotatableTile tile)
        Discards a tile of the players set.
        Parameters:
        tile - tile from player

      • pass

        public void pass()
        Increment consecutive passes counter, other moves reset this counter. Used to keep track of end of game

      • getBoard

        public Board getBoard()
        Getter for board.
        Returns:
        board

      • getPlayers

        public java.util.List<Player> getPlayers()
        Returns players (in their order).
        Returns:
        list of players

      • getCurrentPlayer

        public int getCurrentPlayer()
        Gets current player index.
        Returns:
        index for currentPlayer from players list

      • getTileBag

        Gets the current tile bag.

        tileBag
